content: Operator: Good morning, and thank you for joining us for Marine Products Corporation's Fourth Quarter and Year End 2022 Financial Earnings Conference Call. Net sales for the fourth quarter were a record $108.5 million, a 42% increase compared to the fourth quarter last year. Selling, general and administrative expenses were $12.5 million, an increase of 47% compared to $8.5 million in the fourth quarter of last year. EBITDA in the fourth quarter was $15.3 million, an increase of $4.2 million or 38% compared to the fourth quarter of last year. Yes, until there's -- until -- if and until there's any pushback from dealers saying, I have enough, right, and if we can't redirect those to other existing dealers, so until existing dealers says, no more, then we have to decide, is there additional geographic areas, and there's not significant ones, but there may be very selected opportunities to direct some available production.
